name: Fixed
description:
Gameplay

You control the red circle using the arrow keys. The goal is to reach the one of the finishing points (represented by green squares) as fast as you can!

As an extra challenge, try to also collect all the 3 points scattered in each level before reaching the end of the level.

Important

The current version is a prototype and does not represent the final game. More features and levels are to be added in future versions.

Feedback

Have you tried the game already? Leave a comment or follow the link below to fill in a feedback form. It would be very much appreciated!

Feedback form
